department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on 2023-03-22 by 14:00 EDT. All bids submitted after 14:00 EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) on behalf of The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the supply,  delivery and set-up\/installation of a variety of fitness equipment, as described in the Requirement in Annex Statement of Requirement.

duration_in_months: data_start_date determines maximum length of contract as of 2023-06-01
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

**Title:** [W0125-23WR22] Fitness Equipment

**Reference Number:** WS3882063997-Doc3885552329

**Amendment Number:** 3

A **Request for Proposal** has been issued by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) for the procurement of Fitness Equipment.

**Procurement Details:**

* **Tender Closing Date:** March 22, 2023, at 14:00 EDT
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** June 1, 2023
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Trade Agreements:**

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Regions of Operation:**

* The procurement is open to all qualified bidders, with no specific regions of operation or delivery.

**Contact Information:**

* Alex Fraser (SPAC/PSPC)
* Telephone: Not available
* Email: alexa.fraser@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada

**Notice URL:** [Attached to the tender notice]
   
**Eligibility and Selection Criteria:**
Eligible bidders are required to submit their bids by the specified closing date. Non-responsive bids will not be considered.

**Disclaimer:** The information contained in this announcement is accurate as of the date of issuance, but is subject to change or withdrawal without notice.

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) encourages prospective bidders to review the full solicitation document for more detailed information on this procurement opportunity.

---

**Procurement Category:** [GD]
**Notice Type:** [Request for Proposal]
**Publication Date:** February 28, 2023
**Unspsc Codes:**

* 49200000 - Fitness equipment
* 49201600 - Weight and resistance training equipment
